title: What would be the benefits of Jio 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: Jio 5G would benefit Jio, more than their customers. Jio recently raised $20 billion (INR 152000 crore) from 13 investors including Facebook, Google and Intel with their Jio 5G story. So, the number one benefit of Jio 5G is… it fills Jio’s coffers with cash. However, Jio 5G intends to provide a completely home-grown 5G solution (probably, through Radisys, a company that they acquired a couple of years back). If the model works well, Jio can sell their 5G solutions across the globe. 5G network in India can support a number of Enterprises especially Industries, Factories and Healthcare providers. If Jio manages to reduce the cost of smartphones, they can penetrate the rural India with their 5G offerings. We have onboarded only 50% of the Indian population to the Internet. Jio 5G can help onboard the remaining 50% to the Internet.

Reliance Jio has designed and developed a complete 5G solution from scratch. This will enable us to launch a world-class 5G service in India, using 100% homegrown technologies and solutions.  The entire 5G stack is built in-India by Jio Employees and is ready to roll-out as soon as the spectrum is available. Following are few of the benefits of Jio 5G that will begin the journey of new India - 5G connected drones will help farmersProactive Medical CareBlazing Fast Internet SpeedThis Made-in-India 5G solution will be ready for trials as soon as the 5G spectrum is available and can be ready for field deployment next year. And because of Jio’s converged, all-IP network architecture. Reliance Jio can easily upgrade our 4G network to 5G. Once Jio's 5G solution is proven at India-scale, Jio Platforms would be well-positioned to be an exporter of 5G solutions to other telecom operators globally, as a complete managed service.
